title: ASSESS AND PRIORITIZE RISK
fullText:
The second step of the risk management process is risk assessment.
Prior to undertaking work, a risk assessment shall be carried out at the work site to assess the level of risk associated with all hazards that have been identified.
Where hazards are identified, the risks shall be prioritized, and control measures implemented in accordance with Clause 2.5.
NOTE 1 An example of a risk matrix is included in Appendix E.
NOTE 2 AS/NZS IEC 31010 provides guidance on risk assessments.
